Html:
I've created a package from the msi & cab for Java 7 u60, and once the package is created, approved and displayed on the WSUS server it shows the following;

"The files for this update have not yet been downloaded"

Have I missed something somewhere?

The files were local to the server when I created the package, and when I follow the links to the package directories they appear to be correct with files present.
What is your Wsus infrastructure : How many Wsus servers, do you have Upstream/Downstream servers, Replica ? On which of these Wsus server did you have published the update ?

Very small setup. Just one WSUS server.

I published the files on the one and only WSUS server we have.

I've also done flash 14, which worked, and Adobe Reader which displays the same "The files for this update have not yet been downloaded" message.
Very strange, especially if flash 14 works. Try to delete the package and create it again. If it doesn't work, try to find error messages in the wsus log.
